about.title: About the Property
about.description:
Located in Chança, in Sobral da Abelheira.
This charming 4-room house with a gross construction area of 175 m2 is set on a substantial plot of 971 m2.
about.longDescription:
4-bedroom house in Mafra with 175 m² of construction on a 971 m² plot.
Highlights include a 28 m² living room with fireplace, 16.5 m² kitchen with pantry, 14.5 m² suite, and bedrooms with built-in wardrobes.
The entire house has central heating, attic potential, and is equipped with a heat pump.

Exterior features a 10x4 m saltwater swimming pool, 70 m² garage, T1 annex with AC, kitchenette, and full bathroom, barbecue, traditional oven, and dog kennels.
The property also includes fruit trees and decorative plants.

Located in a quiet area surrounded by nature, close to the beaches of Ericeira, with easy access to Lisbon and Mafra.
Built in 2003 with high-quality materials, it offers stunning views over Tapada de Mafra and the pleasure of countryside living while remaining close to the city.
